title: Sample, ca. 1949
medium:
Medium: synthetic, cotton?
Technique: twill weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 16 x 16 cm (6 5/16 x 6 5/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Twill of mixed cotton and synthetic yarns in shades of blue and metallic gold. Some sections are woven in 2/2 twill, some in 1/3 twill. Warp has stripes of eight bright blue yarns alternating with four wrapped metallic yarns. Weft is blue chenille alternating with three different metallic yarns. Sample is not large enough for a complete repeat.
